typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		data as (attributes as (emails as string[], updatedAt as string), id as string, links as (self as string), meta as (dataConnections as (connection as string, id as string, type as string, url as string)[]), type as string),
		links as (first as string, next as string, prev as string),
		meta as (count as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(data.attributes.emails),
	mapColumn(
		emails = data.attributes.emails,
		updatedAt = data.attributes.updatedAt,
		id = data.id,
		{data.links} = data.links,
		{data.meta} = data.meta,
		links = links,
		meta = meta
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten
Flatten sink(input(
		empid as string,
		empName as string,
		age as string,
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['jsonoutputflat.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		empid = emails,
		empid = updatedAt,
		age = id
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
